en.h1: All in one solution for your online business.
dashboard: One Dashboard for all sales activities
avachat: Never miss a comment on social media
Auto reply to live comments on your FB Livestream
Auto reply to comments on FB posts
reseller: Sell even more with Affiliate and Dropship Feature
webstore: Level up your brand image with owned domain and beautiful website
fbshop: Let your customer purchase directly from FB store
Link your products to your FB store and allow customers to purchase from there
avachatmy: Manage all your messages efficiently on one dashboard
Link AVANA to your WhatsApp, FB Messenger, Telegram, and LINE account. Replying messages has never been so convenient!
marketing: Promote your products using built-in marketing tools
Use our Easy-to-use Facebook Marketing and Google Shopping features to promote your products to more online buyers
whatsapp: Sell more on WhatsApp with AVANA WhatsApp Commerce.
Easily showcase your product, get order enquiries to your WhatsApp, collect online payment, create a seamless customer shopping experience.
en.support: Accelerate your business with our Partners
en.testimonial: We have empowered over 70,000 businesses to sell online
en.error-with-status: Auf dem Server ist ein Fehler ({{statusCode}}) aufgetreten
en.error-without-status: Auf dem Server ist ein Fehler aufgetreten

bm.h1: Penyelesaian semua dalam satu bagi bisnes online anda.
dashboard: Semua aktiviti jualan dalam satu dashboard
avachat: Sentiasa menjawab komen di media sosial
Auto reply komen semasa FB Livestream anda
Auto reply komen di post FB
reseller: Jual lebih banyak dengan Sistem Agent Sales
webstore: Eksklusifkan imej jenama anda dengan domain sendiri dan laman web yang profesional
fbshop: Sekarang pelanggan boleh membeli terus di FB Store anda
Sambungkan produk anda ke FB Store anda untuk pelanggan membeli di sana.
avachatmy: Urus semua mesej anda dengan mudah dalam satu dashboard sahaja
Sambungkan AVANA ke akaun WhatsApp, FB Messenger, Telegram, dan LINE anda. Berbanding sebelum ini, kini proses membalas mesej menjadi lebih mudah dan cepat !
marketing: Gunakan alat pemasaran 'built-in' untuk tujuan promosi produk anda
Gunakan 'Facebook Marketing' dan 'Google Shopping' yang mudah digunakan untuk mempromosikan produk anda kepada lebih ramai pelanggan secara online
whatsapp: Sell more on WhatsApp with AVANA WhatsApp Commerce.
Easily showcase your product, get order enquiries to your WhatsApp, collect online payment, create a seamless customer shopping experience.
bm.support: Antara kerjasama AVANA bersama rakan niaga
bm.testimonial: Apa kata mereka yang sudah menggunakan AVANA?
footerCta: Cuba AVANA selama 14 hari secara PERCUMA!
